alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 10 at 2:37PM EST until December 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, with the highest amounts over the higher terrain. * WHERE...Otsego and Delaware counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The rain changes to snow from the hilltops down to the valleys this evening. The heaviest snowfall rates; around 1 to 1.5 inches per hour are expected overnight into Monday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
